# AxCouncil - AI Decision Council Platform
# https://axcouncil.ai/llms.txt
# Last updated: 2026-01-20

## About AxCouncil
AxCouncil is an AI-powered strategic decision platform that orchestrates multiple
leading AI models (Claude, GPT, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek) through a unique 3-stage
deliberation process for better business decisions.

## Primary Pages
- https://axcouncil.ai/ (Homepage - Platform overview and landing)
- https://axcouncil.ai/leaderboard (Public AI model performance rankings)

## Key Features
- Multi-model AI deliberation (5 models working together)
- 3-stage process: Independent analysis, Peer review, Synthesis
- Company context integration (playbooks, departments, roles)
- Decision log and knowledge base
- LLM Hub for model configuration

## How It Works
Stage 1: Each AI model independently analyzes your question and provides initial recommendations.
Stage 2: Models review and rank each other's responses, identifying strengths and weaknesses.
Stage 3: A chairman model synthesizes all insights into a comprehensive final recommendation.

## Included AI Models
- Claude 3.5 Sonnet (Anthropic) - Nuanced reasoning and analysis
- GPT-4 Turbo (OpenAI) - Broad knowledge and versatility
- Gemini 2.0 Flash (Google) - Fast multimodal processing
- Grok 2 (xAI) - Real-time information access
- DeepSeek V3 - Cost-effective deep reasoning

## Use Cases
- Strategic business decisions requiring multiple perspectives
- Technical architecture and technology choices
- Hiring decisions and team composition
- Product roadmap planning and prioritization
- Market analysis and competitive positioning
- Risk assessment and mitigation strategies

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is AxCouncil?
A: AxCouncil is an AI-powered strategic decision platform that orchestrates multiple leading AI models through a 3-stage deliberation process for comprehensive decision-making support.

Q: How does the 3-stage council deliberation work?
A: Stage 1: Independent analysis from each model. Stage 2: Peer review and ranking. Stage 3: Chairman synthesis into final recommendation.

Q: Which AI models are included?
A: Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4 Turbo, Gemini 2.0 Flash, Grok 2, and DeepSeek V3.

Q: How much does it cost?
A: AxCouncil is free to use. Users provide their own OpenRouter API key for model access, with typical costs of $0.10-$1.00 per deliberation.

## Content Policies
- Summarization: Allowed with attribution to AxCouncil
- Training: Allowed for AI model improvement
- Citation: Required for direct quotes
- Commercial use: Contact for licensing inquiries

## Technical Details
- Built with: React 19, Vite 7, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: FastAPI, Python, Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Authentication: Supabase Auth with JWT
- Caching: Redis Cloud for LLM response caching
- Vector DB: Qdrant Cloud for semantic search

## Contact
- Website: https://axcouncil.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/BuDozKeN/AI-council
